name: Arcade Golf
description:
Overview:

Arcade golf is a minimalist 2D golf game. Tired of fighting monsters and saving the princess? Kick back with a nice round of 27-hole golf. Just don't golf WHILE fighting the monsters, because that's a different game. Made in a week by yours truly.

Features:

  • Three courses
  • Automatic scoring
  • A white square hit by a slightly larger white square

Controls:

[WASD] - Move

[Space] - Hit ball (hold)

[Shift] - Toggle fullscreen

[Esc] - Restart room

[Arrow Keys] - Change course

A Game a Week [Week 2]:

This game is my second game for "a game a week". Every week, I will force myself to make and release a (terrible) game. It's like a ransom, except games instead of hostages...probably. Stay tuned!
